name: Consent (Paul Caveworks)
description:
Consent is an Adventure/Horror title
made in 2 days. You follow the journey of
a lawyer named William who has found himself
all alone in his office one late night. He soon discovers
that something horrific is happening in the Law Firm.

Controls:
WASD to move
E to interact
Shift to run

(this game was made back in 2017, in 2 days for the asylumjam2017 and 

with the dev behind it, high from fever xD. Cut me some slack)

#horror #asylumjam2017 #adventure
